import React from 'react' import {post} from '../../utils/request.js' import history from '../../utils/history' import './AddOne.css' import {DatePicker} from "antd-mobile"; export default class AddOne extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { type: 1, amount: 0, date: new Date(), category: "food", remark: "", } } componentDidMount() { } back(){ history.goBack() } change = e =>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } changeNum = e =>{ const reg = /^(-)*(\d+)\.(\d\d).*$/; e.target.value = e.target.value.replace(reg, "$1$2.$3"); this.setState({[e.target.name]: parseFloat(e.target.value)}); } changeType = e =>{ this.setState({[e.target.name]: parseInt(e.target.value)}); } save = () =>{ let data = { amount: this.state.amount, category: this.state.category, type: this.state.type, date: this.state.date, remark: this.state.remark, } console.log(data) post('insertToBill', data).then( (res) => { console.log(res); }) } render() { return(
记一笔
类别
时间
{this.state.date.getFullYear()}-{this.state.date.getMonth() + 1}-{this.state.date.getDate()}
备注
) } }
